record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="Record Update command panel" and format.name="rupdate" and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: Record Update command panel - rupdate - en
record.format.name: rupdate

brief.brief: The Record Update command panel updates a record in the database.

detail.detail: Record: (file variable) Specify the record variable to update.
Exit if Record Contains All Null Keys: (label) Specify the exit to take if all keys in the record are null.
Exit if Record Contains Invalid Null Keys: (label) Specify the exit to take if the record contains an invalid null key.
Exit if Record Contains Invalid Duplicate Keys: (label) Specify the exit to take if the record contains an invalid duplicate key.
Exit if Record has been Changed: (label) Specify the exit to take if the record has changed since last read.
Exit if Record has been Deleted: (label) Specify the exit to take if the record no longer exists.
You must select a record before you can update it.
You cannot update a record unless you have the current version of the record.
